name: Fruit Ninja (vaibhavkr)
description:
Welcome to a fruits slicing game called Fruit Ninja.

As the name and subtitle says, you have to slice fruits in this game. It supports 2 game modes: 1) Ninja (Time Limit) Mode, 2) Free (No Time, slice as much as you want) Mode

Controls :

1. Left click on the fruits with your knife to cut them.

2. Escape : Pause/Back/Quit (If you will press Escape in HTML5 version, it will end up the game internally)

Features :

  • Two game modes : Ninja Mode and Free Mode
  • Can be played in HTML5 (directly in browser online)

CREDITS & ATTRIBUTIONS :
